Game.tutorial_00_landscape:
Match any of YOUR HANDS to
PRIZE HANDS to win instantly.

Press SHOW PRIZE HANDS
to view the prizes available.
Game.tutorial_00_portrait:
Match any of YOUR HANDS to
PRIZE HANDS to win instantly.

Press SHOW PRIZE HANDS
to view the prizes available.
Game.tutorial_01_landscape:
Royal Flush – 10, Jack, Queen, King and Ace of the same suit

Straight Flush – Any five consecutive Card Symbols of the same suit

Four of a Kind – Any four Card Symbols of the same Rank

Full House – Any Three of a Kind plus One Pair
Game.tutorial_01_portrait:
Royal Flush – 10, Jack, Queen, King and Ace of the same suit

Straight Flush – Any five consecutive Card Symbols of the same suit

Four of a Kind – Any four Card Symbols of the same Rank

Full House – Any Three of a Kind plus One Pair
Game.tutorial_02_landscape:
Flush – Any five non-consecutive Card Symbols of the same suit

Straight – Any five consecutive Card Symbols

Three of a Kind – Any three Card Symbols of the same Rank

Two Pairs – Any two pairs
Game.tutorial_02_portrait:
Flush – Any five non-consecutive Card Symbols of the same suit

Straight – Any five consecutive Card Symbols

Three of a Kind – Any three Card Symbols of the same Rank

Two Pairs – Any two pairs
Game.tutorial_03_landscape:
Find a GOLDEN CHIP to trigger the LUCKY SUITS bonus game!

Choose your LUCKY SUIT

Reveal all 12 Card Symbols – Match 4 or more 
Card Symbols to your LUCKY SUIT to win prizes!
Game.tutorial_03_portrait:
Find a GOLDEN CHIP to trigger the LUCKY SUITS bonus game!

Choose your LUCKY SUIT

Reveal all 12 Card Symbols – Match 4 or more 
Card Symbols to your LUCKY SUIT to win prizes!
Game.tutorial_04_landscape:
At the end of each game there will be a LUCKY HAND draw!

5 Cards will be revealed

Match 2 or more Card Symbols within
Any individual YOUR HAND to the LUCKY DRAW hand to win!
Game.tutorial_04_portrait:
At the end of each game there will be a LUCKY HAND draw!

5 Cards will be revealed

Match 2 or more Card Symbols within
Any individual YOUR HAND to the LUCKY DRAW hand to win!
